alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 1:26AM MST until December 27 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 70 MPH. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin, East Platte County and Central Carbon County. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. There is a high risk for blow overs and blowoffs.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 MPH or gusts of 58 MPH or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
